Title: Meiwaku Danchi
Description: ["6 children sit in front of the classroom and constantly gossip. When one of them is absent for three days due to a cold, the rest remain quiet as they don't want to leave the other child out from day-to-day gossip."]
Related: ['Prequel: Mobile Suit Gundam: Iron-Blooded Orphans', 'Sequel: Mobile Suit Gundam: Iron-Blooded Orphans 2nd Season']
